# Why?

I struggle with moving from html documents to PDF. I love [Pagedown](https://github.com/rstudio/pagedown) but every year I feel like there is more prayer than skill to generate a PDF document. I can't quite get the tables I want in pagedown.

I am determined to use Typis this year.

[Typist](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/typst.html) seems great but is not a plug and play system--a lot of configuration is required.

This blog post is a very sold starting point. 

>  https://rfortherestofus.com/2025/11/quarto-typst-pdf
